channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Heartland
channel.desc: Amy and Caleb train one of Sam's rescue horses to be a roping horse; Jack and Tim disagree about Blue's future; Katie and Logan go river rafting and end up on a bigger adventure than they expected.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: BC Today
channel.desc: The show where British Columbians connect on issues facing their lives and their community.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Jonnie Irwin helps a couple from London make a life-changing move to rural Wiltshire; Jonnie also meets a group of bicycling enthusiasts, joining them on a ride through the fascinating Longleat Estate.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Family Feud Canada
channel.desc: The Baillie family tries to bank another $10,000 as they face the Frenette family.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Kim's Convenience
channel.desc: Umma has her heart set on a coat at the auction; Jung accuses Shannon of acting unprofessional; Janet's big payday gets foiled.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Downton Abbey
channel.desc: It's been a long time coming for Anna, but her patience is finally rewarded; elsewhere family members clash over the estate and the future.
